metadata.title: CVE-2018-19839 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
In LibSass prior to 3.5.5, the function handle_error in sass_context.cppallows attackers to cause a denial-of-service resulting from a heap-basedbuffer over-read via a crafted sass file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-19839` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libsass1 - 3.5.5-4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libsass package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.5.5-4').
